text: Kenneth Leigh Goodman (born September 17, 1947) is an American politician and a former Democratic member of the North Carolina General Assembly.http://votesmart.org/candidate/biography/117834/ken-goodman#.VWu- nWTBzGc He represented the 66th district.http://ncchamber.capwiz.com/bio/id/64244 Goodman resigned from the legislature in 2019 to accept an appointment from Gov. Roy Cooper to serve on the North Carolina Industrial Commission.Richmond County Daily Journal During the 2016 legislative session, Goodman was one of 11 Democrats to vote in favor of HB2, the controversial "Bathroom Bill." http://www.newsobserver.com/news/politics-government/politics-columns- blogs/under-the-dome/article141701219.html – 'Here’s how every NC legislator voted on the HB2 repeal bill(MARCH 30, 2017) Goodman graduated from Wingate University for his associate degree, and from Florida State University for his bachelor's degree.https://ballotpedia.org/Ken_Goodman – 'Ken Goodman Goodman was the son of Richmond County Sheriff R.
